de.fhb.sailboat.gui

Class GUILogicImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fhb.sailboat.gui.GUILogicImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GUILogic

    public class GUILogicImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements GUILogic
    This class represents the program logic used by a GUInterface. It handles updating, sending and converting of value displayed and set via the GUI.
    Author:
    Patrick Rutter

      • updateLogic

        public void updateLogic()
        This will be called once per gui_loop (see UPDATE_RATE) and can be used to manage timed tasks. Basic usage is to call update logic.
        Specified by:
